trans-unit.source: layout: page title: "Install Test Pilot" permalink: /test-pilot/ lang: en ref: test-pilot parent: activities
trans-unit.target: layout: page title: "Install Test Pilot" permalink: /test-pilot/ lang: en ref: test-pilot parent: activities

trans-unit.source: redirect_from: "/experiments/test-pilot/"
trans-unit.target: redirect_from: "/experiments/test-pilot/"

trans-unit.source: TOC
trans-unit.target: TOC

trans-unit.source: {:toc}
trans-unit.target: {:toc}

trans-unit.source: When building features for hundreds of millions of Firefox users worldwide, it’s important to get them right.
trans-unit.target: When building features for hundreds of millions of Firefox users worldwide, it’s important to get them right.

trans-unit.source: To help figure out which features should ship and how they should work, we created the new Test Pilot program.
trans-unit.target: To help figure out which features should ship and how they should work, we created the new Test Pilot program.

trans-unit.source: Test Pilot is a way for you to try out experimental features and let us know what you think.
trans-unit.target: Test Pilot is a way for you to try out experimental features and let us know what you think.

trans-unit.source: You can turn them on and off at any time, and you’ll always know what information you’re sharing to help us understand how these features are used.
trans-unit.target: You can turn them on and off at any time, and you’ll always know what information you’re sharing to help us understand how these features are used.

trans-unit.source: Of course, you can also use Test Pilot to provide feedback and suggestions to the teams behind each new feature.
trans-unit.target: Of course, you can also use Test Pilot to provide feedback and suggestions to the teams behind each new feature.

trans-unit.source: [More info...](https://blog.mozilla.org/blog/2016/05/10/you-can-help-build-the-future-of-firefox-with-the-new-test-pilot-program/)
trans-unit.target: [More info...](https://blog.mozilla.org/blog/2016/05/10/you-can-help-build-the-future-of-firefox-with-the-new-test-pilot-program/)

trans-unit.source: Impact and Metrics
trans-unit.target: Impact and Metrics

trans-unit.source: Firefox is key to how Mozilla expresses its values and makes the Web increasingly exciting in the face of walled gardens like individual apps.
trans-unit.target: Firefox is key to how Mozilla expresses its values and makes the Web increasingly exciting in the face of walled gardens like individual apps.

trans-unit.source: By testing new features and functionality, you help to keep Firefox on the leading edge and consumers engaged in our product.
trans-unit.target: By testing new features and functionality, you help to keep Firefox on the leading edge and consumers engaged in our product.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, it gives you a chance to go even deeper with specific feedback and ideas for Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, it gives you a chance to go even deeper with specific feedback and ideas for Firefox.

trans-unit.source: Goals for this area
trans-unit.target: Goals for this area

trans-unit.source: __Impact:__
trans-unit.target: __Impact:__

trans-unit.source: 500 Test Pilot add-on installs
trans-unit.target: 500 Test Pilot add-on installs

trans-unit.source: __Strength:__
trans-unit.target: __Strength:__

trans-unit.source: 300 shares of Test Pilot link from the activity page
trans-unit.target: 300 shares of Test Pilot link from the activity page

trans-unit.source: 50 Discourse Posts
trans-unit.target: 50 Discourse Posts

trans-unit.source: Audience for this activity
trans-unit.target: Audience for this activity

trans-unit.source: The audience this activity is anyone who is passionate about the Web and knows their way a little around Web browsers.
trans-unit.target: The audience this activity is anyone who is passionate about the Web and knows their way a little around Web browsers.

trans-unit.source: No programming skills are necessary.
trans-unit.target: No programming skills are necessary.

trans-unit.source: It is for people who like to try new things and are not shy in telling us what they think.
trans-unit.target: It is for people who like to try new things and are not shy in telling us what they think.

trans-unit.source: Activity Format
trans-unit.target: Activity Format

trans-unit.source: While this activity can be run solo, we encourage you to run an event in your community to get together people to learn about testing experimental Firefox features and discuss what is upcoming in the browser.
trans-unit.target: While this activity can be run solo, we encourage you to run an event in your community to get together people to learn about testing experimental Firefox features and discuss what is upcoming in the browser.

trans-unit.source: We recommend a smaller, more informal event, such as a MozCoffee.
trans-unit.target: We recommend a smaller, more informal event, such as a MozCoffee.

trans-unit.source: Event Flow
trans-unit.target: Event Flow

trans-unit.source: [Install Test Pilot](http://testpilot.firefox.com/experiments?utm_source=activity.mozilla.community%26utm_medium=referral%26utm_campaign=moz-community-2016)
trans-unit.target: [Install Test Pilot](http://testpilot.firefox.com/experiments?utm_source=activity.mozilla.community%26utm_medium=referral%26utm_campaign=moz-community-2016)

trans-unit.source: Enable and test features
trans-unit.target: Enable and test features

trans-unit.source: Provide feedback via the add-on
trans-unit.target: Provide feedback via the add-on

trans-unit.source: Start a discussion on [Discourse](https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/c/test-pilot)
trans-unit.target: Start a discussion on [Discourse](https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/c/test-pilot)

trans-unit.source: Output
trans-unit.target: Output

trans-unit.source: Additional to the recommended flow here are some things we’d like you, the event organizer, to do.
trans-unit.target: Additional to the recommended flow here are some things we’d like you, the event organizer, to do.

trans-unit.source: Fill out the post-event metrics on the event page you setup on the Reps portal
trans-unit.target: Fill out the post-event metrics on the event page you setup on the Reps portal

trans-unit.source: Tell us about how you got on.
trans-unit.target: Tell us about how you got on.

trans-unit.source: What was your favourite new browser feature?
trans-unit.target: What was your favourite new browser feature?

trans-unit.source: [Test Pilot Discourse](https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/c/test-pilot)
trans-unit.target: [Test Pilot Discourse](https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/c/test-pilot)

trans-unit.target: [Feedback about the activity specifically](https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/t/activate-mozilla-install-test-pilot/10075/1)

trans-unit.source: Extra
trans-unit.target: Extra

trans-unit.source: Feel like doing more for Test Pilot?
trans-unit.target: Feel like doing more for Test Pilot?

trans-unit.source: Contributors are welcome to check out [our github repo](https://github.com/mozilla/testpilot/)
trans-unit.target: Contributors are welcome to check out [our github repo](https://github.com/mozilla/testpilot/)

trans-unit.source: Here’s a [list of good first bugs](https://github.com/mozilla/testpilot/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Agood-first-bug) if you would like to dive in
trans-unit.target: Here’s a [list of good first bugs](https://github.com/mozilla/testpilot/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Agood-first-bug) if you would like to dive in

trans-unit.source: The [Test Pilot Wiki](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Test_Pilot) has lots of information about public meetings, communication and the Test Pilot roadmap
trans-unit.target: The [Test Pilot Wiki](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Test_Pilot) has lots of information about public meetings, communication and the Test Pilot roadmap
